item.title: Quant
item.description: Quantitative models for financial market forecasting, both known methods and custom built analysis on several different markets spanning stocks, commodities, derivatives and bonds (constantly updated).

item.title: WPI-SKCM2 Winter School, Japan 2024
item.description: Presentation given at the WPI-SKCM2 winter school @ Hiroshima Univeristy, Japan.

item.title: Edinburgh-Glasgow Ultramarathon
item.description: My first ultramarathon clocking 93km @ 13:19:33 running from Edinburgh to Glasgow via the canal.

item.title: Edinburgh Marathon
item.description: First marathon I’ve run, averaging 5:49km pace for a 4:07:29 official time.

item.title: Spot a Knot
item.description: Spot a Knot game for teaching the difficulty in discerning topological objects (specifically knots) from one another for the general public.

item.title: 3D Smectic Liquid Crystals
item.description: During the summer of 2023 I was funded to work on a project concerning the development of 3D smectic liquid crystal simulation in C++ and Python. My work concerned developing methods to constrain tensors to physically realizable states using lagrangian multipliers.

item.title: 100Kg Clean and Jerk
item.description: Milestone 100kg Oly lifting Clean and Jerk about 1 1/2 years into training.

I’m a 1st year PhD maths student based at the University of Edinburgh, jointly supervised by Davide Michielleto & Tudor Dimofte. I work primarily on the intersection between pure and applied mathematics using machine learning to investigate problems in knot theory spanning both protein folding and topological invariants.
